hero.title: AI Companionship for Everyone
hero.subtitle: In the future, intelligent robots will enter every home.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To provide intelligent humanoid robot services for every family, making AI companionship a part of daily life.

vision.title: Company Vision
vision.text: JT M&C PTE. LTD. is committed to becoming an industry pioneer, leading innovation and application of artificial intelligence and humanoid robot technology, bringing intelligent and convenient life experiences to families worldwide.

mission.title: Company Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to enable every family to enjoy the convenience and warmth brought by artificial intelligence through continuous technological innovation and product optimization, achieving a perfect integration of technology and humanity.

responsibility.title: Social Responsibility
responsibility.text: We are deeply aware of the responsibility of technological development and are committed to promoting the responsible application of artificial intelligence, ensuring that our products respect privacy, ensure security, and promote inclusion while improving quality of life.

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.text: Based on advanced natural language processing technology, providing comprehensive life and work assistant services.

companion.title: Companion Robot
companion.text: An intelligent partner with emotional recognition capabilities, providing warm companionship and interactive experiences for you and your family.

data.title: Data Analysis
data.text: Powerful data processing and analysis tools to help you gain valuable insights from massive information.

universe.title: Universe Exploration Simulator
universe.text: Through advanced AI technology, take you to explore the mysteries of the universe and experience immersive space travel.

future.title: Next Chapter: The Era of Home Intelligent Robots
future.text: We are creating a new era where every family will have their own intelligent robot assistant. They will not only be able to complete household chores but also provide emotional support, health monitoring, educational guidance, and other services. The future is here, join us in welcoming this new era full of possibilities.

footer.address: Address: 101 upper cross street #04-17 people's park centre S058357
